chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Type) (B : A -> Type) (R : forall x : A, B x -> Prop), FiniteT A -> (forall x : A, exists y : B x, R x y) -> exists f : forall x : A, B x, forall x : A, R x (f x)

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on = fun A B : Type => forall R : A -> B -> Prop, (forall x : A, exists y : B, R x y) -> exists f : A -> B, forall x : A, R x (f x) : Type -> Type -> Prop Arguments ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on (_ _)%type_scope
ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on = fun A B : Type => forall R : A -> B -> Prop, inhabited B -> exists f : A -> B, forall x : A, (exists y : B, R x y) -> R x (f x) : Type -> Type -> Prop Arguments ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on (_ _)%type_scope
ChoiceFacts.SmallDrinker'sParadox = forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), inhabited A -> exists x : A, (exists x0 : A, P x0) -> P x : Prop
Inductive clos_trans_n1 (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (x : A) : A -> Prop := tn1_step : forall y : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y | tn1_trans : forall y z : A, R y z -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 A R x z Arguments Relation_Operators.clos_trans_n1 _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.tn1_step _%type_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.tn1_trans _%type_scope
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x
Setoid.Seq_trans : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y z : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y z -> Aeq x z
Setoid.Seq_refl : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x : A, Aeq x x
Setminus_intro : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), In A x -> ~ In B x -> In (Setminus A B) x
option_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
Inductive Union (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) : Ensemble U := Union_introl : forall x : U, In B x -> In (Union B C) x | Union_intror : forall x : U, In C x -> In (Union B C) x Arguments Union {U}%type_scope Arguments Union_introl _%type_scope Arguments Union_intror _%type_scope
Union_introl : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In B x -> In (Union B C) x
Included = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) => forall x : U, In B x -> In C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop Arguments Included {U}%type_scope
BinInt.Z.min_mono : forall f : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful BinInt.Z.le BinInt.Z.le) f -> forall x y : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.min (f x) (f y) = f (BinInt.Z.min x y)
Union_intror : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U), In C x -> In (Union B C) x
ChoiceFacts.fun_choice_and_small_drinker_imp_omniscient_fun_choice : (forall A B : Type, inhabited B -> ChoiceFacts.FunctionalChoice_on A B) -> ChoiceFacts.SmallDrinker'sParadox -> forall A B : Type, ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on A B
intro_invertible : forall (f : ?X -> ?Y) (g : ?Y -> ?X), (forall x : ?X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : ?Y, f (g y) = y) -> invertible f where ?X : [ |- Type] ?Y : [ |- Type]
Ring_theory.ARadd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
Inductive invertible (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) : Prop := intro_invertible : forall g : Y -> X, (forall x : X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : Y, f (g y) = y) -> invertible f Arguments invertible {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments intro_invertible {X Y}%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
Ring_theory.ARopp_mul_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (rmul x y)) (rmul (ropp x) y)

Ring_theory.ARsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
Record ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_rt { Radd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; Radd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); Rdistr_l : forall x y...
Ring_theory.ARadd_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd (radd x y) z) (radd (radd y z) x)
Ring_theory.ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
Ring_theory.ARadd_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z)
Ring_theory.ARdistr_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z))
Setminus = fun (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (x : U) => In B x /\ ~ In C x : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Ensemble U Arguments Setminus {U}%type_scope
Ring_theory.ARopp_add : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (ropp (radd x y)) (radd (ropp x) (ropp y))
Ring_theory.ARmul_1_l : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x
Ring_theory.ARadd_0_r : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> Ring_theory.almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x : R, req (radd x rO) x

```coq
intros A B R Hfinite Hchoice.
apply ChoiceFacts.fun_choice_and_small_drinker_imp_omniscient_fun_choice with (A:=A) (B:=B) in Hchoice.
destruct Hchoice as [f Hf].
apply (fun_choice_on A B R) in Hfinite.
destruct Hfinite as [g Hg].
assert (Hfg: forall x:A, R x (f x)).
{ intros x.
apply Hf.
apply Hg.
}
assert (Hgf: forall x:A, R (f x) x).
{ intros x.
rewrite <- Hfg.
apply Setoid.Seq_sym.
apply Hg.
}
apply (ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on A B R) in Hgf.
destruct Hgf as [h Hh].
assert (Hfh: forall x:A, R (f x) (h x)).
{ intros x.
rewrite <- Hgf.
apply Hh.
}
assert (Hhf: forall x:A, R (h x) x).
{ intros x.
rewrite <- Hfh.
apply Hg.
}
apply (ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on A B R) in Hhf.
destruct Hhf as [k Hk].
assert (Hhk: forall x:A, R (h x) (k x)).
{ intros x.
rewrite <- Hhf.
apply Hk.
}
assert (Hkh: forall x:A, R (k x) x).
{ intros x.
rewrite <- Hhk.
apply Hg.
}
exists k.
split.
{ intros x.
apply Hkh.
}
{ intros x.
rewrite <- Hkh.
apply Hg.
}
Qed.

original: intros A B R Hfinite Hchoice. apply ChoiceFacts.fun_choice_and_small_drinker_imp_omniscient_fun_choice with (A:=A) (B:=B) in Hchoice. destruct Hchoice as [f Hf]. apply (fun_choice_on A B R) in Hfinite. destruct Hfinite as [g Hg]. assert (Hfg: forall x:A, R x (f x)). { intros x. apply Hf. apply Hg. } assert (Hgf: forall x:A, R (f x) x). { intros x. rewrite <- Hfg. apply Setoid.Seq_sym. apply Hg. } apply (ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on A B R) in Hgf. destruct Hgf as [h Hh]. assert (Hfh: forall x:A, R (f x) (h x)). { intros x. rewrite <- Hgf. apply Hh. } assert (Hhf: forall x:A, R (h x) x). { intros x. rewrite <- Hfh. apply Hg. } apply (ChoiceFacts.OmniscientFunctionalChoice_on A B R) in Hhf. destruct Hhf as [k Hk]. assert (Hhk: forall x:A, R (h x) (k x)). { intros x. rewrite <- Hhf. apply Hk. } assert (Hkh: forall x:A, R (k x) x). { intros x. rewrite <- Hhk. apply Hg. } exists k. split. { intros x. apply Hkh. } { intros x. rewrite <- Hkh. apply Hg. }
